name: Red Guerrilla
description:
My attempt at a Reia Roja deck, the identity that will be released on December in the Mala Tempora data pack.
This is a deck that focus in forcing the Corp to make a lot of hard choices.
Forged Activation Order becomes a dilemma if the Corp needs to pay 3 extra credits due to a Rook on the same server and Reina ability.
Being Vamped while a Medium is installed puts the corp at risk of a triple run on R&D for at least six cards accessed, and then the necessity to BOTH gain credits and purge virus on the next turn.
Parasite+Datasucker becomes more punishing if a simple Ice Wall has been rezzed paying 3 or 4.

name: R&D rush
description: My version of kits R&D rush on the popular deck list. If you truly hate Escher you can drop it for another makers eye or Larla. This version takes care of the lack of draw and memory unit problems I feel may come up with the other deck. Djinn also let's you search for your data suckers and can host SMC if necessary leaving SMC for Icebreakers and instant parasite options. Losing medium does suck but with the R&D interfaces and makers eye I think its fine.

name: Noise: Mill Factory
description:
Solitaire as hell. 46 possible virus mills. Don't bother stealing agendas unless you have to plow into archives. You might even get a bankroll going with DC and aesops gaining you more than you're spending on viruses and NACH.

I hate solitaire decks, but I wanted credit for being the first to publish this.

Gain click from Joshua B -> aesops unwanted program for 3 -> draw 2 cards from wyldside -> install at least 2 but up to 4 virus programs -> gain x credits from scheherazade (since sahasrara pays for them) -> duck incoming tag using scheherzade credits or profit if you installed 3.

Better than 3 amigos IMO. Wait. its the new 3 amigos (noise, joshua, Aesop!)

name: Kate's Replicator Box
description: This is my rough decklist for a replicator deck. I've had this nagging itch to run replicators, because its such a strong ability, but it's generally hard to enterprise on. The deck definitely makes some concessions about (I couldn't even find the deck space for sure gambles, for example), so thoughts on how to per down the deck and get some of that basic framework into the deck, any ideas are more than appreciated

name: Jinteki Shell
description:
Guard Central Severs
trick out runner with multiple Remote Servers randomly trapped.

name: Weyland_BABW_ST_Scorched
description:
Agenda composition is pretty standard, I consider economy agendas to be superior to offensive agendas so I use Corporate War and Government Contracts instead of Private Security Force and The Cleaners.

Ice composition does not contain Wall of Static, the rest is pretty standard. Great ice to have in your starting hand: Enigma, Ice Wall, Eli 1.0. You can follow these up with Archer, and Hadrian for a secure server or with more low cost ice for a expensive, credit-starving server.

Restructure took the place of Green Level Clearance as your credits are often higher than 10.
